name: Downloads List - Alternating List Row Color
description:
Downloads List - Alternate Rows will have a Blue Background Color.

Features:
+ Rows 1,3,5,7.... will be colored.  
+ Adds navigability and increases look
+ Selected Rows will be black text/dark blue background

Applies to:
+ Downloads window
+ Alternating Table
+ Downloads Sidebar
+ Download Manager popup
+ I am going to classify this style as a WOW style, because it is really cool.

Browser Versions:
+ Works on Firefox 3

Additional Information:
+ Feel free to edit the CSS.  You can customize the HEX Colors.

Integrates with the following Styles:
+ Style 8306
+ Style 8692
+ Style 8564

Changelog:
1.0.0.1:
+ Code fixed for Firefox 3.5+ (Thanks to User 27339 for the code)
